Description: Seizing our country, killing the pilot of the Insurgent Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Oleksiy Mes. He heroically demonstrated his remaining battle in the sky. Oleksiy Mes was a strong and dedicated warrior, a high-class pilot, a leader on earth and in the sky, a good friend, a loving son, a father, a man, a patriot of his land. Twenty virgins On the 5th sickle, his brothers came to say goodbye to him - pilots, commanders and colleagues, friends and colleagues, hundreds of ordinary Ukrainians. A couple of MiG-29s fell from the sky to the fallen pilot. Flight over the procession ended with Oleksiya's fighting friends. By order of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Lieutenant Colonel Oleksiy Mes was posthumously awarded the military rank of Colonel. We have lost a reliable friend and a strong warrior. But they have NOT wasted the strength, will and passion to fight, fight and overcome.
